column4: I try to run this: http://paste.debian.net/hidden/e3de27d3/ but when I run it and agree to deleting the directory contents, it comes back with: rm: cannot remove `/home/sixil/Dustbin/*': No such file or directory
you got * quoted so deeply the shell is not parseing it..  rm is seeing the actual '*' character
i bet spaces in file names will mess you up also
